thread.title: Video: Trailer Podcast - Astronaut Chris Hadfield talks about new album
thread.title_full: Video: Trailer Podcast - Astronaut Chris Hadfield talks about new album

title: Video: Trailer Podcast - Astronaut Chris Hadfield talks about new album
text:
October 7, 2015 ’s Space Oddity during his stay on the International Space Station: He recorded an entire album’s worth of original songs about life in orbit around the big blue ball. The album is called Space Sessions: Songs From A Tin Can. 
Famed Canadian astronaut Chris Hadfield did more than just sing David Bowie’s Space Oddity during his stay on the International Space Station: He recorded an entire album’s worth of original songs about life in orbit around the big blue ball. The album is called Space Sessions: Songs From A Tin Can. © Copyright (c) The Vancouver Sun
